outperformed.from sentence: As shown in the table , Mazajak model outperformed the current state - of - the - art models on the SemEval and ASTD datasets .

high performance.from sentence: In addition , it achieved a high performance on the ArSAS dataset .

all the evaluation scores.including: average recall , F P N , and accuracy

reported scores.from sentence: Our reported scores are higher than current top systems for all the evaluation scores , including average recall , F P N , and accuracy .

our tool.from sentence: These results confirm that our model choice for our tool represents the current state - of - the - art for Arabic SA .
